Package mediator

Class StudentHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • mediator.StudentHolder
  • public final class StudentHolder
extends java.lang.Object
    A class which only purpose is to keep data of one Student object between windows in GUI. Class has private constructor and final static instance variable that calls the constructor to ensure that only one instance of this class exists in the system (singleton class).
